body:
**update:** the efforts of updating `font-awesome` are super huge, especially since we also use an additional soft-deprecated way of using icons as pseudo elements... It would make more sense to to this update combined with a refactoring of legacy css parts...

I'll keep the branch around, but for now I don't think it makes much sense.
